name: Fortress Of My Own
description:
Build a fortress and survive waves of monsters on a small planet.

Trailer Tutorial
  • Health is the green bar at the bottom right. This will heal overtime as long as you have energy.
  • Energy is the purple bar above health. Eat food by left clicking while holding.
  • Water is the blue bar above energy, it does nothing yet.
  • The brown bar is wood you can carry up to 500. Touch a crafting bench to deposit.
  • The grey  bar is stone you can carry up to 250. Like wood touch a crafting bench to deposit.
  • Right Click to pickup tools.
  • Left Click to use/shoot tools.
  • Hold Left Click on stones/trees to gather resources
  • Select items from the crafting bench to queue.
  • Hold Right Click to move blocks.
  • Drop food on crops to plant.
  • There is a lot more to experiment with and discover. Have Fun :)
